channel.title: c++ on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in c++ on Developer Playground

item.title: Compiling C++ on Linux
item.description: Checking GLIBC version on Linux system $ ldd --version ldd (Ubuntu GLIBC 2.27-3ubuntu1) 2.27 Hello World hello.cpp #include <iostream> int main() { std::cout << "Hello World\n"; } $ g++ -o hello hello.
